title: How to cancel a Jio fiber request - Quora

response.answer_text: Contact their customer care office and inform them of your cancellation request both verbally and through e-mail. If your cheque has not been encashed yet, make a request to your bank fir stop payment, while send a copy of the request to Jio informing that you've taken this step. Rest of the steps you'll need to take as per the written response of Jio authorities.
